title: The Vegetarian Cottage
description: Part of Spa Food vegetarian restaurants in Bangkok. Choose from a variety of mock meat dishes. Try the spicy banana flower salad. Kitchen breaks in the afternoon til 5:30pm. Directions: Take taxi to Vipawadeerangsit Rd or Ratchadaphisek Rd, it's near the airport. At soi 21 in soi 16 of Vipavadhi Rangsit - at the end of the soi, cross a small canal and turn right or you could also enter from Ratchadaphisek soi 19, close to the metro station Ratchadaphisek.
streetAddress: 41/19 Soi Chokchai Ruammit, Vibhavadi-Rangsit Rd Soi 16/21
